TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DataAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Provides members to describe attributes of data in columns.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets or sets the name of a column.
Gets or sets a private storage field to hold the value from a column.
Docs.value: The name of the storage field.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Storage property values are case sensitive. For example, ensure that values used in the attribute for the Storage property match the case for the corresponding property names used elsewhere in the code. This applies to all .NET programming languages, even those which are not typically case sensitive, including [!INCLUDE[vb_current_short](../../add/includes/vb-current-short-md.md)].
## Examples
```vb# <Column(Storage:=_CustomerID)> _ Public CustomerID As String ```
```c# [Column(Storage="_CustomerID")] public string CustomerID { } ```

Docs.returns: The name of the storage field.
